std.value: It was Saturday. My father took me to go fishing. But I didn't want to do that. There were so many beautiful fish in the river. I didn't want to eat them. People should live in harmony with our environment. So when my father was fishing, I wrote a board secretly. I jumped into the river and tied the board to the fishhook. My father thought there was a fish and pulled it out. He was so surprised to see a board with words "We don't eat fish today". I laughed and felt very proud.
std.ai: It was Saturday. My father took me to go fishing. But I didn't want to do that. There were so many beautiful fish in the river. I didn't want to eat them. People should live in harmony with our environment. So when my father was fishing, I wrote a board secretly. I jumped into the river and tied the board to the fishhook. My father thought there was a fish and pulled it out. He was so surprised to see a board with words "We don't eat fish today". I laughed and felt very proud.

std.value: It was Saturday. I went fishing with my father. He was good at fishing so he had caught several fish in a short time. I didn't want to eat them, so I wrote a board and jumped into the river. I tied the board to the fishhook. My father felt different and pulled it out. He found it was a board with several words saying "Today we don't eat fish". I told my father my thoughts and he agreed with me. Then we went home happily.
std.ai: It was Saturday. I went fishing with my father. He was good at fishing so he had caught several fish in a short time. I didn't want to eat them, so I wrote a board and jumped into the river. I tied the board to the fishhook. My father felt different and pulled it out. He found it was a board with several words saying "Today we don't eat fish". I told my father my thoughts and he agreed with me. Then we went home happily.

std.value: It was Saturday. Jim's father took little Jim to go fishing. Though Jim didn't want to go, he still went there. When his father was sitting there, Jim wanted to do something to change his father's mind of keeping fishing. Therefore, the little Jim jumped into the river carefully. He brought the board he had prepared and tied it to the fishhook. After a while, his father realized something different with his fishhook. His father was very happy and he took back the hook. He was shocked when he saw a board was closely tied to his hook. And there were a few words on the board: We don't eat fish today.
std.ai: It was Saturday. Jim's father took little Jim to go fishing. Though Jim didn't want to go, he still went there. When his father was sitting there, Jim wanted to do something to change his father's mind of keeping fishing. Therefore, the little Jim jumped into the river carefully. He brought the board he had prepared and tied it to the fishhook. After a while, his father realized something different with his fishhook. His father was very happy and he took back the hook. He was shocked when he saw a board was closely tied to his hook. And there were a few words on the board: We don't eat fish today.

std.value: It was Saturday. A boy and his father went fishing together. While his father sat there fishing, the boy sat on the other side of the boat drawing. After finishing his drawing, he took the wooden board he had prepared and tied it to the fishing hook. After a while, his father noticed something unusual with the fishing hook. His father was very excited and reeled in the hook. When he saw a wooden board tightly tied to the hook, he was very surprised. On the wooden board were a few words: "Today, we are not eating fish."

info.keypoint: 1. It was Saturday.</br>2. My father took me to go fishing. But I didn't want to do that. There were so many beautiful fish in the river. I didn't want to eat them.</br>3. People should live in harmony with our environment. So when my father was fishing, I wrote a board secretly.</br>4. I jumped into the river and tied the board to the fishhook. My father thought there was a fish and pulled it out.</br>5. He was so surprised to see a board with words "We don't eat fish today". I laughed and felt very proud.</br>
